title: Olaf is broken...
body:
Now hold on. You might look at this title and think, "Ugh, another rant thread" and you'd be wrong. I literally just got to playing as Olaf and 100% dumpstered the entire enemy team. Badly. It legitimately felt like there was absolutely nothing they could do against me. They ran a Shen, Kindred, Yasuo, Vayne and Karma. I completely blew up Shen early. Kindred came to lane while I was low, trying to sneak a kill in. I dumpstered his ass in 3 seconds for a double kill and from there it was all snowball. I sat under an inhib tower, tanking Kindred for ~8 solid seconds. She got me to about 15%, tower fell and a moment later, so did the lamb. Then the Vayne came up. I was at 20%. You get the idea.

I ended the game 12/3/1 and my only deaths were literally spent laugh taunting under towers in a 1v4 just to squeeze out every ounce of salt I could out of them. I get that Olaf is supposed to be the end-all-be-all champion of the 1v1, but *holy fucking dogshit, Batman*, OLAF IS JUST BROKE. Lol.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 

Thank you so much Riot. I need champions in my life who just define freelo.

As if my elo has any appreciable value in a champion's power. He's braindead to play and hits like a minivan. He's strong in any elo.

It actually has an a large value on a champions power because most champions are really strong in high elo or low elo and weak the other way around. Very few champions are both. For example, zed players suck massive balls in your elo, in my elo, they are good. In your elo katerina or darius can spank anyone and carry easily. Not the same in plat or diamond.

Also he has a 54 percent win rate in bronze and a 46 percent win rate in Plat where i am. Hes a low elo stomper

Olaf isn't even strong in bronze, he has less than a 50% winrate in every elo.
Snowballing in one game doesn't make a champion broken. Like I said before, he falls off HARD late game. his early game is just really, really good.
I'm bronze and can confirm that this is true.
